mapper.select: SELECT PE.ID, PE.NAME, PE.FIRST_SURNAME, T.POINTS_JANUARY, T.POINTS_FEBRUARY, T.POINTS_MARCH, T.POINTS_APRIL, T.POINTS_MAY, T.POINTS_JUNE, T.POINTS_JULY, T.POINTS_AUGUST, T.POINTS_SEPTEMBER, T.POINTS_OCTOBER, T.POINTS_NOVEMBER, T.POINTS_DECEMBER, T.DATE_JANUARY, T.DATE_FEBRUARY, T.DATE_MARCH, T.DATE_APRIL, T.DATE_MAY, T.DATE_JUNE, T.DATE_JULY, T.DATE_AUGUST, T.DATE_SEPTEMBER, T.DATE_OCTOBER, T.DATE_NOVEMBER, T.DATE_DECEMBER FROM C_PEOPLE PE INNER JOIN C_TICKET T ON PE.ID = T.ID_PEOPLE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO C_TICKET (ID_PEOPLE, YEAR, POINTS_JANUARY, POINTS_FEBRUARY, POINTS_MARCH, POINTS_APRIL, POINTS_MAY, POINTS_JUNE, POINTS_JULY, POINTS_AUGUST, POINTS_SEPTEMBER, POINTS_OCTOBER, POINTS_NOVEMBER, POINTS_DECEMBER) VALUES (#{people.id},#{year}, #{pointsJanuary}, #{pointsFebruary}, #{pointsMarch}, #{pointsApril}, #{pointsMay}, #{pointsJune}, #{pointsJuly}, #{pointsAugust}, #{pointsSeptember}, #{pointsOctober}, #{pointsNovember}, #{pointsDecember})
mapper.update:
UPDATE C_TICKET DATE_JANUARY = #{dateJanuary}, POINTS_JANUARY = #{pointsJanuary}, DATE_FEBRUARY = #{dateFebruary}, POINTS_FEBRUARY = #{pointsFebruary}, DATE_MARCH = #{dateMarch}, POINTS_MARCH = #{pointsMarch}, DATE_APRIL = #{dateApril}, POINTS_APRIL = #{pointsApril}, DATE_MAY = #{dateMay}, POINTS_MAY = #{pointsMay}, DATE_JUNE = #{dateJune}, POINTS_JUNE = #{pointsJune}, DATE_JULY = #{dateJuly}, POINTS_JULY = #{pointsJuly}, DATE_AUGUST = #{dateAugust}, POINTS_AUGUST = #{pointsAugust}, DATE_SEPTEMBER = #{dateSeptember}, POINTS_SEPTEMBER = #{pointsSeptember}, DATE_OCTOBER = #{dateOctober}, POINTS_OCTOBER = #{pointsOctober}, DATE_NOVEMBER = #{dateNovember}, POINTS_NOVEMBER = #{pointsNovember}, DATE_DECEMBER = #{dateDecember}, POINTS_DECEMBER = #{pointsDecember},
WHERE ID_PEOPLE = #{people.id}
